attributes.action: I want season shooting to be banned completely. it is vile and disgusting!!
attributes.additional_details:
We need to ban all bird shooting!! It is estimated that 100,000 birds are shot every day in the UK during the shooting season. the 'shooting season' goes on for 4 months. They often survive being shot and are only killed by having their necks broken or being hit over the head, if the shot has been missed. we need to put a stop to this and ban it COMPLETELY.
Enough is enough and we need this to be banned.
attributes.background:
I have just witnessed people shooting poor birds when they have done nothing wrong. it is disgusting and it should be stopped immediately!! 
100,000 birds are shot/necks broken for this 'hobby' of theirs. i want this banned now!!
